law.text: Except as otherwise provided hereinafter, no person shall practice architecture in the Commonwealth of Kentucky without first obtaining a license under the provisions of this chapter, it being the purpose of this chapter to safeguard the life, health, property and welfare of the public.
law.history: Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 218, sec. 2, effective June 16, 1960. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 73-1.
